speaker: EXTON
text:
Didst
               
              thou
               
              not
               
              mark
               
              the
               
              King
              ,
               
              what
               
              words
               
              he
               
              spake
              ,

speaker: EXTON
text:
“
              Have
               
              I
               
              no
               
              friend
               
              will
               
              rid
               
              me
               
              of
               
              this
               
              living
               
              fear
              ?
              ”

speaker: EXTON
text:
“
              Have
               
              I
               
              no
               
              friend
              ?
              ”
               
              quoth
               
              he
              .
               
              He
               
              spake
               
              it
               
              twice

speaker: EXTON
text:
And
               
              urged
               
              it
               
              twice
               
              together
              ,
               
              did
               
              he
               
              not
              ?

speaker: EXTON
text:
And
               
              speaking
               
              it
              ,
               
              he
               
              wishtly
               
              looked
               
              on
               
              me
              ,

speaker: EXTON
text:
As
               
              who
               
              should
               
              say
               
              “
              I
               
              would
               
              thou
               
              wert
               
              the
               
              man

speaker: EXTON
text:
That
               
              would
               
              divorce
               
              this
               
              terror
               
              from
               
              my
               
              heart
              ”
              —

speaker: EXTON
text:
Meaning
               
              the
               
              king
               
              at
               
              Pomfret
              .
               
              Come
              ,
               
              let’s
               
              go
              .

speaker: EXTON
text:
I
               
              am
               
              the
               
              King’s
               
              friend
               
              and
               
              will
               
              rid
               
              his
               
              foe
              .
